C. W. BENTLEY, JR.

C. W. BENTLEY & SONS,

25 South Front street, near Baltimore st.
Bridge.

Steam Boiler Work of all kinds a specialty.

Our Works have recently been fitted with
new and very expensive Machinery,
whereby a great improvement is effect-
ed in the manufucture of Boilers,
Tanks, &ec., producing more close and
perfect workmanship with greater
rapidity and less eost. All plates are
planed to the proper bevel for caulking,
s0 that the objectionable practice of
splitting the edges of plates to save the
expense of chipping the bevel by hand
is avoided, and less pressure is required
in caulking to make the work tight.
The punching is done so perfectly exact
as not to require the use of Drift-pin
or Reamer, consequently the seams of
Boilers are less liable to crack by use,
and greater safety and durability is ob-
tained.

Send for circular.

C. W. BENTLEY. JOHN E. BENTLEY.
C. W. BENTLEY, JR.

C. W. BENTLEY & SONS,

25 South Front street, near Baltimore st.
Bridge.

Steam Boiler Work of all kinds a specialty.

Our Works have recently been fitted with
new and very expensive Machinery,
whereby a great improvement is effect-
ed in the manufucture of Boilers,
Tanks, &ec., producing more close and
perfect workmanship with greater
rapidity and less eost. All plates are
planed to the proper bevel for caulking,
s0 that the objectionable practice of
splitting the edges of plates to save the
expense of chipping the bevel by hand
is avoided, and less pressure is required
in caulking to make the work tight.
The punching is done so perfectly exact
as not to require the use of Drift-pin
or Reamer, consequently the seams of
Boilers are less liable to crack by use,
and greater safety and durability is ob-
tained.
